name: Spongebob: Jellyfish Hunt
description:
Management: 
  •  Arrow keys to move 
  •  Space bar to hunt
Spongebob: Jellyfish Hunt You're a spongebob, your boss Mr. Crabs, sent you to the jellyfish field after seeing you eat a sandwich with their jam, and now he wants to make one! But his wishes don't please the other jellyfish, and his wishes keep getting bigger and bigger! Collect as many jellyfish as you can in the right amount of time! Perhaps then you will appease the old crab and his desires! Make for TriJam #208
